name: jupyterlab_allofus
description: Extension for All of Us Jupyter notebooks.

scripts.codegen: yarn run copy-yaml && yarn run codegen-clean && yarn run codegen-swagger && yarn run post-codegen
scripts.codegen-swagger: java -jar utils/swagger-codegen-cli.jar generate --lang typescript-angular --input-spec https://raw.githubusercontent.com/all-of-us/workbench/$npm_package_config_api_tag/api/src/main/resources/client_api.yaml --output src/generated --additional-properties ngVersion=2
